main event: On 17 February 1955, one light blue object was seen by an observer at 35,000 feet over Blackstone, Virginia.
interesting points: The object was described as extremely brilliant and large., The sighting lasted for about 20 seconds., The observer was a military USAF Major/Pilot., There were a total of 16 witnesses to the event., Despite the sighting, it was not investigated due to a lack of information.
witness description: military personnel and others present during the observation
